com.teamten.typeset

Class BookLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamten.typeset.BookLayout

  • public class BookLayout
extends Object
    Manages the overall layout of the book. This includes the position and format of the page numbers, the section headers, etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BookLayout(String bookTitle, long pageWidth, long pageHeight, long pageMargin, Font pageNumberFont, float pageNumberFontSize) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configureFromBookmarks(Bookmarks bookmarks)
      Look through the bookmarks to figure out where the body starts and, for any given page, what part and chapter it's in.
      void drawHeadline(Page page, PDPageContentStream contents)
      Draw the headline (page number of part or chapter title) at the top of the page.
      long getBodyHeight()
      The height of the text on the page.
      long getBodyWidth()
      The width of the text on the page.
      long getPageHeight() 
      long getPageMargin() 
      String getPageNumberLabel(int physicalPageNumber)
      Returns the displayed page number label for the physical page number.
      long getPageWidth() 
      Iterable<Map.Entry<Integer,SectionBookmark>> sections()
      Returns an ordered sequence of the sections in this document.

      • configureFromBookmarks

        public void configureFromBookmarks(Bookmarks bookmarks)
        Look through the bookmarks to figure out where the body starts and, for any given page, what part and chapter it's in.

      • sections

        public Iterable<Map.Entry<Integer,SectionBookmark>> sections()
        Returns an ordered sequence of the sections in this document. The integer key is the physical page number.

      • drawHeadline

        public void drawHeadline(Page page,
                         PDPageContentStream contents)
                  throws IOException
        Draw the headline (page number of part or chapter title) at the top of the page.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getPageNumberLabel

        public String getPageNumberLabel(int physicalPageNumber)
        Returns the displayed page number label for the physical page number. The displayed page number might be in roman or arabic numerals.
